About Selected Projects

ECUAD Catalog Website

UI/UX, Web, Front-end, WordPress

I designed and developed the 2012 Emily Carr Graduation Exhibition Catalog Website. The site showcases works of art & design by students. I handled design, front-end development, content acquisition, and content management.
